com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries.actions
Class AbstractContainerAction<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries.actions.AbstractAction
      com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries.actions.AbstractContainerAction<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the container object
All Implemented Interfaces:
Action, ContainerAction<T>
public abstract class AbstractContainerAction<T>
extends AbstractAction
implements ContainerAction<T>

Implements the ContainerAction interface by obtaining the container object, making it available, and giving child actions the opportunity to use it. The actual provision of the container objects is taken care of by subclasses.

                                     throws ActionException,
                                            ContextException
Creates or finds the container object for child actions to use.

Parameters:
context - the context in which this action operates
Returns:

Throws:
